meanings.definition: A smell or scent, especially a pleasant one.
meanings.sent1: The bakery was filled with delightful odours of freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent2: The odours of flowers in the garden filled the air with sweetness.
meanings.sent3: The odours of the delicious food made everyone's stomach growl.
meanings.sent4: The odours of success lingered in the room long after the presentation.
meanings.sent5: The odours of the ocean brought back memories of summer vacations.

meanings.definition: The characteristic smell of a substance or place.
meanings.sent1: The odours of the forest were earthy and refreshing.
meanings.sent2: The odours of the factory were strong and industrial.
meanings.sent3: The odours of the gym socks could be detected from a mile away.
meanings.sent4: The odours of the old books in the library were like a trip back in time.
meanings.sent5: The odours of the campfire reminded them of cozy nights under the stars.
